create.tooltip.create_fuel_motor.fuel_bu: Fuel determines how long the motor runs
create_fuel_motor.ponder.fuel_motor.head: Powering the Fuel Motor with Dropped Fuel
create_fuel_motor.ponder.fuel_motor.text: The Fuel Motor generates Rotational Force by consuming burnable fuel
Just drop a fuel item in the block rang of 3x3 to power the motor!
Each fuel item powers the motor for a duration based on its burn time
create_fuel_motor.ponder.fuel_motor_1.he: Powering the Fuel Motor with Funnel
create_fuel_motor.ponder.fuel_motor_1.te: The Fuel Motor generates Rotational Force by consuming burnable fuel
You can also feed fuel using a funnel!
Each fuel item powers the motor for a duration based on its burn time
